document.full_text: the trial of ratko mladic before the yugoslav war crimes court will reopen old wounds in the netherlands, whose troops were defending muslims in the u.n. "safe haven" at srebrenica when bosnian serb tanks rolled in.
document.title: mladic arrest revives dutch angst over srebrenica
lines_and_colors: the trial of ratko mladic before the yugoslav war crimes court will reopen old wounds in the netherlands, whose troops were defending muslims in the u.n. "safe haven" at srebrenica when bosnian serb tanks rolled in.
